text: If I want to enter another room and it has a closed entrance, which part of the image should I approach and open?
Suppose you wish to enter another room with a closed entrance. What would you approach and open in the picture?
If you wish to enter an enclosed room with a closed entrance from your current location in the picture, which area of the image should you approach and open?
Suppose you want to access a separate room with a closed entrance. Which area in the picture would you approach to open and gain entry?
If you want to enter another room and the entrance appears to be closed, what is the appropriate area in the image to approach and open?
Suppose you want to move to a restricted area within an edifice, what region in this picture should you approach and open?
